description.para: My Guitar Shop is an example of a web shop application.
It is created in React typescript with Redux for state management. Register, Log in and database is handled by Google's Firebase.
It has features for sorting, filtering and searching items.
In admin section you can CRUD items from database, view users profiles and their shopping history.
Scheduler app is an application made for managing and displaying buisness meetings. It's purpose is to display, on a androidtablet, whether or not the meeting hall is occupied.
It is created in React while Google's Firebase is only used for hosting. For backend I used Express.js server with local .json file database as requested by client.
Unfortunately 'Visit page' button is useless because application has private login.
This web site is static, blog kind of web application. It is made with Gatsby.js and pure CSS.
It contains all of my projects with descriptions, images and links to their urls and GIT repositories. For deploying and hosting I used Netlify.
